name: Kyomu No Byouki
description:
El jugador se sumerge en un mundo futurista, donde juega desde la perspectiva de nuestro protagonista, que por un experimento quedo  “vacío” y tiene que ir experimentando diferentes recuerdos y situaciones por medio de elecciones, lo que hará que su personalidad se desarrolle de una manera u otra.

The player is immersed in a futuristic world, where he plays from the perspective of our protagonist, who was left "empty" by an experiment and has to experience different memories and situations through choices, which will cause his personality to develop differently one way or another.

The game is only in Spanish at the moment :(
